subject: Football
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Rod Woodson, Shannon Sharpe, John Randle and Bruce Smith, the N.F.L.’s career sacks leader, are the only first-year eligible players to make the final round.
snippet: Rod Woodson, Shannon Sharpe, John Randle and Bruce Smith, the N.F.L.’s career sacks leader, are the only first-year eligible players to make the final round.
